app.welcome: Welcome to Jir, a Hippo tool for the commandline. Currently the dataset is being checked out and installed. This will only take a few seconds.
archetypes.major: Showing latest %s major Hippo archetypes, please choose one or view all
archetypes.all: Showing all Hippo archetypes, please choose one
archetype.mvn.data:
- Project name: %s
   - Package: %s
   - ArtifactId: %s
   - GroupId: %s
   - Version: %s
archetype.mvn.die:
Failed to create the Hippo archetype. Maven output :
 %s
die.no.git: Jir requires git to be installed, could not detect the executable %s
die.no.mvn: Jir requires Maven3 to be installed, could not detect the executable %s
